original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoiakim, and his abominations which he did, and that which was found in him, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah: and Jehoiachin his son reigned in his stead.
korean_text: 여호야김의 남은 사적과 그가 행한 모든 가증한 일들과 그에게 발견된 악행이 이스라엘과 유다 열왕기에 기록되니라 그의 아들 여호야긴이 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoiakim
and his abominations which he did
and that which was found in him
behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 이스라엘과 유다 왕들의 책에 기록되어 있고

sentences.original_text: and Jehoiachin his son reigned in his stead
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 여호야긴이 그의 자리에 대신하여 통치하였다
